data.title: Guide to Law Online: Lesotho
data.meta_description: This guide, prepared by the Law Library of Congress, includes links to free online resources regarding the country of Lesotho, focusing on its constitution; executive, legislative and judicial branches; legal guides; and general sources.
data.text:
Law Library: Ask a Librarian

Have a question? Need assistance? Use our online form to ask a librarian for help.

Follow Us

Read more about the Law Library's global collections by subscribing to our RSS feeds and email alerts, following our blog In Custodia Legis, and finding our Facebook External and Twitter External page.
